content.text:
The racial term <image 1> can refer to ____. 

A. A black person living in Canada
B. People whose ancestors came to Canada through the slave trade
C. A white person who originated in Africa and now lives in Canada
D. Any of the above

The racial term "African" can refer to a person whose ancestors came to Canada through the slave trade. Therefore, the correct answer is:

B. People whose ancestors came to Canada through the slave trade
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
